pages.text: Welcome to the age of Metals! well, dont expect too fancy stuff here, because you can only start with copper, and maybe some tin.
pages.title: Mining ores

pages.text: You can mine these so called malachite and cassiterite ores with your flint pickaxe, but it would be faster with a stone one.
pages.title: Resources aroud you

pages.text: Malachite is a green-ish ore, which is the mineral form of the well known copper; And there is cassiterite which is a blue-ish light-gray ore, alias tin.
pages.title: Some facts
